page.title: 09EVENTS
page.content:
{ { May Day Fair
The May Day Fair is held on May Day Bank Holiday once a year.The Fair is held in the Triangle if the weather is fine,if it rains we usually hold it in the village hall,or the school.There are lots of entertainments like the Mayjorettes and the ceremany of the crowning.there are stalls aswell which sell games and toys,you can also play games on a stall to,like throwing darts and getting a prize.Each class from the school does an entertainment.We raise the money for school equipment.This fair has been going on since the Queen Silver Jubilee in 1977. There is also a Summer Fayre to support the village hall.
